title: MemEasy
description: A modern iOS flashcard application that streamlines studying through intuitive swipe gestures and smart progress tracking. Built with SwiftUI and leveraging SwiftData for persistence, the app allows users to create custom decks, import flashcards from PDFs, and study with engaging card animations.

title: Neon News
description: A responsive web application that aggregates and displays real-time news content using the NewsAPI. Features include dynamic content filtering, advanced search functionality with autocomplete, and a clean, modern UI built with vanilla JavaScript. Implemented RESTful API integration, client-side caching for improved performance, and mobile-first responsive design principles. The application handles thousands of API requests efficiently while maintaining optimal load times.

title: ScholarlyMate
description: Allows students to create a personalized study schedule, set reminders for assignments and exams, and track progress on learning goals.
